original_title: 刑期を終えた強姦魔が10年ぶりに女を犯した日。 東條なつ
overview: It's been a long time... I was sentenced to 10 years for severe injury and strong obscenity. And today, he was released from prison after completing his sentence. When I was young, I was abused by my mother, and I completely developed my propensity. The first experience was when I was a student, and the opponent was a childhood friend in the neighborhood. On that day as well, I was beaten by his mother, and I forced my childhood friend who was always kind to me. ……I am excited to conquer a woman.
title: The day a convicted rapist fucks a woman for the first time in 10 years. Natsu Tojo
